trans-unit.source: Represents a right granted to a user to access information in a rights managed document.
trans-unit.target: 관리 되는 문서는 권한 있는 정보에 액세스 하려면 사용자에 게 부여 된 권한을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: As with other <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement> types, ContentGrant is only usable in full trust applications.
trans-unit.target: 다른와 마찬가지로 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement>형식의 ContentGrant이 완전 신뢰 응용 프로그램에서 사용할 수만 있습니다.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant"></xref> class that grants a specified <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser"></xref> a specified <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentRight"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant"> </xref> 지정 된 권한을 부여 하는 클래스 <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser"> </xref> 지정 된 <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentRight"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant> instance with no date or time limitations.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자는 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant>인스턴스와 날짜 또는 시간 제한이 없습니다.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.ValidFrom%2A> property is set to <xref:System.DateTime>.<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue> which indicates there is no starting limitation.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.ValidFrom%2A>속성이 <xref:System.DateTime>.<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue> 로 설정 됩니다.</xref:System.DateTime.MinValue> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.ValidFrom%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.ValidUntil%2A> property is set to <xref:System.DateTime>.<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue> which indicates there is no ending limitation.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.ValidUntil%2A>속성이 <xref:System.DateTime>.<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue> 로 설정 됩니다.</xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.ValidUntil%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the alternate <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create an instance with date and time limitations.
trans-unit.target: 대신 사용 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.%23ctor%2A>날짜 및 시간 제한 사항과 함께 인스턴스를 만드는 데 생성자.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The user the access right is granted to.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 액세스 권한이 부여 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The access right that is granted.
trans-unit.target: 액세스 권한을 부여 받은입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant"></xref> class that grants a specified <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser"></xref> a specified <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentRight"></xref> for a specified <xref:System.DateTime> duration.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant"> </xref> 지정 된 권한을 부여 하는 클래스 <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser"> </xref> 지정 된 <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentRight"> </xref> 지정한 <xref:System.DateTime>기간.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Specify the `validFrom` parameter with <xref:System.DateTime>.<xref:System.DateTime> if there is no start date and time limitation.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 `validFrom` 매개 변수를 <xref:System.DateTime>.<xref:System.DateTime> 는 시작 날짜 및 시간 제한이 없는 경우.</xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Specify the `validUntil` parameter with <xref:System.DateTime>.<xref:System.DateTime> if there is no end date and time limitation.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 `validUntil` 매개 변수를 <xref:System.DateTime>.<xref:System.DateTime> 는 종료 날짜 및 시간 제한이 없는 경우.</xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The user the access right is granted to.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 액세스 권한이 부여 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The access right that is granted.
trans-unit.target: 액세스 권한을 부여 받은입니다.

trans-unit.source: The starting date and time that the right begins.
trans-unit.target: 시작 날짜 및 시간을 오른쪽에서 시작

trans-unit.source: The ending date and time that the right expires.
trans-unit.target: 종료 날짜 및 오른쪽 만료 되는 시간입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentRight"></xref> that is granted.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentRight"> </xref> 권한이 부여 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The access right that is granted to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.User*>, as specified to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 액세스 권한에 부여 되는 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.User*>에 지정 된 대로 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.%23ctor%2A> 생성자.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.User*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the user who is granted the access <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.Right*>.
trans-unit.target: 액세스 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.Right*>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.Right*> 부여 받은 사용자를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The user that the access <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.Right*> is granted to, as specified to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 사용자는 액세스 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.Right*>부여 됩니다에 지정 된 대로 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.%23ctor%2A> 생성자.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.Right*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the starting date and time that the granted <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.Right*> begins.
trans-unit.target: 시작 날짜와 시간을 가져옵니다 부여 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.Right*>시작.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.Right*>

trans-unit.source: The start date and time that the granted <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.Right*> begins, or <xref:System.DateTime>.<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue> if there is there is no starting limitation.
trans-unit.target: 시작 날짜와 시간을 부여 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.Right*>시작 또는 <xref:System.DateTime>.<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue> 는 시작 제한이 없는 경우.</xref:System.DateTime.MinValue> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.Right*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the ending date and time that the granted <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.Right*> expires.
trans-unit.target: 종료 날짜와 시간을 가져옵니다 부여 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.Right*>만료.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.Right*>

trans-unit.source: The end date and time that the granted <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.Right*> expires, or <xref:System.DateTime>.<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue> if there is no ending limitation.
trans-unit.target: 끝 날짜와 시간을 부여 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.Right*>만료 되 면 또는 <xref:System.DateTime>.<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue> 로 설정 하는 경우.</xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.Right*>
